Detailed Description

Listener for Interstitial ads.

Author:
2009-2014 Flurry, Inc. All Rights Reserved

The listener for Interstitial ads. A listener is set of callback methods that allow a developer to manage and take actions within different phases of ad display.

See also:
Flurry Publisher Support Site for more information

Member Function Documentation

void onAppExit ( FlurryAdInterstitial  adInterstitial  ) 

Invoked when the user is about to be taken outside the app.

This method indicates that an ad has been clicked and the user is about to be taken outside the app.

Parameters:
adInterstitial The corresponding interstitial ad object.
void onClicked ( FlurryAdInterstitial  adInterstitial  ) 

Invoked when an ad is clicked.

This method indicates that an ad has been clicked.

Parameters:
adInterstitial The corresponding interstitial ad object.
void onClose ( FlurryAdInterstitial  adInterstitial  ) 

Invoked when an ad is closed.

This method indicates that an ad has been closed.

Parameters:
adInterstitial The corresponding interstitial ad object.

Invoked when an ad is displayed.

This method indicates that an ad has been displayed.

Parameters:
adInterstitial The corresponding interstitial ad object.
void onError ( FlurryAdInterstitial  adInterstitial,
FlurryAdErrorType  adErrorType,
int  errorCode 
)

Invoked when an error occurs.

This method indicates that an error has occurred.

Parameters:
adInterstitial The corresponding interstitial ad object.
adErrorType The type of error.
errorCode The error code.
void onFetched ( FlurryAdInterstitial  adInterstitial  ) 

Invoked when an ad is fetched.

This method indicates that an ad has been received from the server and stored locally.

Parameters:
adInterstitial The corresponding interstitial ad object.
void onRendered ( FlurryAdInterstitial  adInterstitial  ) 

Invoked when an ad is rendered.

This method indicates that an ad has been rendered.

Parameters:
adInterstitial The corresponding interstitial ad object.
void onVideoCompleted ( FlurryAdInterstitial  adInterstitial  ) 

Invoked when video viewing has been completed.

This method indicates that video viewing has been completed. The app can check the server for the rewards if this is a rewarded ad space.

Parameters:
adInterstitial The corresponding interstitial ad object.
